name: Alien Invasion (itch) (VVabi)
description:
Made the following modifications:

- Added two more levels

- Added new enemy types (different color scheme only, no new skins)

-UI displays number of remaining lives and number of enemies to kill to complete level

- Modified Pause screens to be less boring and added some hints

- Player can now collect lives in some levels

- Player now actually dies when colliding with asteroids
